entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is the husband of Mrs. Dursley and the father of Dudley. He is described as being dazed and confused by the sudden understanding between Harry and his wife.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a boy who has been living with his cruel relatives, Uncle Vernon and Aunt Petunia. He is described as being in danger from Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is a dark wizard who murdered Harry's parents and is now sending dismembers after him.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is the wife of Uncle Vernon and the mother of Dudley. She is described as being white-faced and looking at Harry with concern.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is the son of Uncle Vernon and Aunt Petunia. He is not mentioned in this specific passage but is a part of the Dursley family.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon is angry with Harry and tells him to get out of the house.
Lord Voldemort is sending dismembers after Harry, putting him in danger.
